nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_110
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Suppose you found out that your colleague takes bribes, would you just ignore it?

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_111
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: We've given up on him because he is so stubborn. It is pointless to argue with him.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_112
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He hit upon a good method to speed up the progress of the experiment, but opinions differed among members of the group on it.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_113
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Today I'm able to square my profession with my interest, which I wasn't able to do before.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_114
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The ability to visually distinguish between red and green is essential to becoming a driver.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_115
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The team consisted of seven people who met on a regular basis to share their information with each other.
